about_the_game:
Embark on an Unparalleled Journey as a Medieval Merchant

Step into a living, breathing medieval world where your words carry weight and your decisions shape destinies. In this groundbreaking RPG, you don the mantle of a merchant navigating the intricate tapestry of commerce, politics, and power. But you're not just any merchant—you are the linchpin in a realm teetering on the brink of transformation.

Revolutionary AI-Powered Interactions

Experience conversations like never before. Our NPCs aren't scripted mannequins; they're dynamic personalities powered by OpenAI's ChatGPT. Engage in intelligent, unscripted dialogues that evolve naturally based on your choices. With real-time speech-to-text and lifelike text-to-speech courtesy of Eleven Labs, every exchange feels as authentic as a face-to-face conversation. Procedural animations generated on the fly add a layer of realism that pulls you deeper into the narrative.

Dynamic Gameplay That Adapts to Every Decision

No two playthroughs are the same. Your bartering skills, alliances, and moral choices ripple through the game world, affecting economies, relationships, and even the course of wars. Will you manipulate markets for personal gain or foster prosperity for all? The dynamic AI ensures that NPCs remember your actions, react accordingly, and even scheme in their own self-interest.

Rise from Merchant to Monarch

Accumulate wealth and influence as you climb the social ladder. Your journey doesn't stop at amassing gold; it's about wielding power. Prevent conflicts or ignite them, negotiate peace treaties or incite rebellion—the fate of the townsfolk and the realm ultimately rests in your hands. Ascend to kingship and make decisions that will echo through history. Will you be a benevolent ruler or a tyrant feared by all?

Key Features:

Intelligent NPCs: Interact with AI-driven characters who think, learn, and adapt, offering a fresh experience with every conversation.
Real-Time Communication: Utilize cutting-edge speech-to-text and text-to-speech technology for seamless, immersive dialogues.
Procedural Animations: Witness characters express themselves with animations generated in real-time, adding depth and authenticity.
Player-Driven Economy: Influence market trends, supply and demand, and the financial well-being of entire towns.
Consequential Choices: Every decision affects the game world, leading to multiple endings and endless replayability.
Ascend to Power: Go beyond trading—shape the political landscape and decide the future of the kingdom.
A Living World Awaits

Immerse yourself in a game where AI breathes life into every character, and your voice can alter the course of history. Forge your own path in a world that responds to your actions and desires. The realm is alive, and it's time for you to make your mark.

Are you ready to speak, trade, and lead your way to destiny?

name: Talking Coin
short_description: You are a medieval merchant! Barter with the AI-driven NPCs powered by ChatGPT, featuring real-time speech and procedural animations! Your choices matter! Earn gold and influence—prevent or start wars, become king, and decide your town's fate. Dynamic gameplay ensures a unique experience every time.
